channel.title: Changing Important identifiers
channel.description:
www.whonix.org/wiki/Protocol-Leak-Protection_and_Fingerprinting-Protection
In case I change Color depth, add fonts, change user name and hostname this will increase my anonymity and privacy or it will make me less secure ?

item.title: Changing Important identifiers
item.dc:creator: torjunkie
item.description:
Probably the same principle as Tor / Tor Browser. Anytime you change settings that make you non-uniform and it can be detected, you suddenly drop into a very small subset of users.

Rinse, repeat for each detectable change. A few changes later, you’re screwed and unique. See the entries at top of wiki documentation - it’s covered there somewhere.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing Important identifiers
item.dc:creator: Cikim
item.description:
Whonix

Protocol-Leak-Protection and Fingerprinting-Protection

Protection from IP Leaks, DNS Leaks, Protocol Leaks and Fingerprinting. Analysis of host hardware identifiers visible or hidden inside virtual machine...

In case I change Color depth, add fonts, change user name and hostname this will increase my anonymity and privacy or it will make me less secure ?

Read full topic
